Better late than never. Right before they tee off, let's find a bet for the **PGA Championship Picks**. You can find out what makes our golf model so fancy down the bottom of the page. But let's not waste any more time checking out the outputs for the 2021 PGA Championship. - - - ## **2021 PGA Championship Predictions** Without further ado, we've listed each player on our fancy table with their fair odds, set to a 100% market. Control+F your favorite golfers or just slowly examine the top 50 or so. It's a dang strong field. Underneath the table you'll see our commentary about the reining champ and then our betting selections.
- - - ## **PGA Championship Picks** Coming soon. - - - ## **Why Should I Care About Your Model?** Glad you asked. Firstly, our chief data scientist is no joke. He makes a healthy living by betting off his sports models. His most recent, our golf model, uses the last 15 years of data to produce win predictions for PGA tournaments. The model can be broken down into three stages: 1. **Historic score adjustment** Firstly, historic golf scores are adjusted to account for varying course difficulty and conditions on the day. For example a "-2" on a certain course/day combination may be an average score but on another course/day combination it might be a great score due to the course being more difficult and/or unfavorable conditions. This adjustment is necessary so that we can compare players on a like for like basis. 2. **Score prediction** We then create features using the adjusted historic scores and run a few machine learning algorithms on top of these, weighting each equally. These provide an accurate prediction for the most likely score that a player will achieve on an average course in the future. 3. **Simulation** Using these future score predictions, for a given tournament we can then simulate each player's score using their own score distribution to come up with win percentages and fair odds for each player in a tournament. - - - ## **More Golf Betting Expertise** If you love betting on golf like us, check out our **[Top 50 World Golf Rankings](https://www.betrefinery.com/golf-betting/world-golf-rankings)**. We update them every week. Plus we have a **[How To Bet On Golf Guide](https://www.betrefinery.com/golf-betting/how-to-bet-on-golf)** that we think you'll love too. Whilst we might play off 22 when we go around the course, our golf betting is off scratch.
